comment: Amazing Course! Multiple attempts on all test. Multiple attempts for review. Great information that prepares you for the exams. Excellent instructor. Tough but fair class.

Great class, great teacher.  Her assignments are open so you can work at your own pace.  But be sure to turn in your work by the deadline.  She does not accept late work for any reason.  She gives multiple attempts on homework and tests.  She responds to emails fairly quickly.  She seems to really care about her students.

Her class is clear. There are very helpful resources that she gives. I was nervous at first but through out the semester  it became so easy. Take her if you can. Grades are Modules assignment and exams only.

This class was a relief in terms of how little stress it created. There were unlimited attempts at the homework and multiple attempts at the exams. Make sure to do them before the deadline though, as she does not extend for any reason. Only issue I had was the lectures were not the best and had to find outside sources to learn some of the concepts.

Literally the Best! Her class was clear cut and straight forward.  I knew what to expect from the beginning. She follows the schedule she sets out from day one and she sticks to it. I strongly recommend if you are comfortable with online learning.

As someone who struggles with math, I must say that Professor Doriney is an awesome professor. Her assignments may be a little challenging at times but you have unlimited attempts on each homework assignment and two attempts on every test therefore your guaranteed to make an A or B

The content was super easy at times, and others, extremely difficult. ConnectMATH exams are difficult, took all of 2 hours to complete - beware, there are 5 parts to each question! My nerves were shot with each exam! I worked very hard in this course, and I am satisfied with my grade. Responded quickly with questions/emails. Know your calculator!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Lots of homework

comment: Homework problems dont resemble the notes, test problems dont resemble notes or homework problems. Youre left having to teach yourself everything. She actually teaches you nothing. All the tests were curved because she realized halfway through the semester we were being tested on things we never learned. Only positive is no lockdown browser.

Avoid Dorineys statistics class at all costs. Multiple tests on aleks with questions that werent a part of the unit/we didnt learn. Her lectures are very weak and have very little content. All work is on aleks, and you get unlimited attempts on homework and two attempts on tests; none of that was enough to compensate for her poor teaching.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Be ready to do everything yourself, she actually teaches you nothing, only reason I got an A- was because I know how to teach myself. Also, it would give me an option for STAT 1401, but that what I actually took.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: I made an A in this class, but only because I made sure to get 100's in the material. Sure, you're given unlimited homework attempts and two tries on the exams, but her lectures are feeble (she just reads snippets from the book, no example problems) and she barely responds to emails. The final was a joke, she ended up dropping that grade. Yikes.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: I did not like taking stat at all but Prof Doriney was really nice about unlimited attempts on homework and 2 attempts on the final. I might have enjoyed her class more in person but if it wasn't for the multiple chances I definitely would have failed! She is a good option for those who take a little longer to understand math concepts.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Never responded to my emails. Everything except the final is done in Connect Math. Use the examples and guided solutions to learn the material. You get two chances to take each test. So there is not any reason you can't make an A.

I took Stat 1401 with Mrs. Doriney Online, Wouldn't recommend as you are left to teach yourself the class, she doesn't give extra credit, and the class is fairly difficult if you aren't good at math. Don't take her unless it's in person
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class consists of 2-3 hw assignments per unit, 4 tests, and a final exam. This class was pretty easy, but if you cannot teach yourself I wouldnt recommend. Unlimited tries on hw and 2 tries per test, so its an easy A. PLEASE LEARN HOW TO USE YOUR CALCULATOR! Your calculator will be your best friend in this class. I used the TI-84 Plus :)

Professor Doriney laid out how everything would go, and you can complete the entire class ahead of time. 4 tests, the final replace the lowest test grade. NO extra credit. You can take tests twice (different questions of course) and homework assignments are unlimited so you can get a 100 on all of them.

This professor is very direct with how her course will progress. She makes a schedule that outlines the due dates for all assignments. It should be noted, in that regard, that she refuses to accept late/missed work. Therefore, it is important to stay aware of upcoming assignments. That being said, she really cares and wants her students to pass!

This class is one that gets progressively harder as time goes on and her lectures were great other than the idea that using practice problems would be better than the homework being the practice problems. Also make sure you know how to work the calculator as it is understood that you know it already when starting assignments. Good luck!
rating_tags: Respected--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Monica Doriney is a nightmare teacher. Doesnt care if you pass or fail and easily the hardest grader and most confusing teacher Ive ever had. She teaches way too fast, and its frustrating to speak to her. Ive always gotten As & Bs in school, and math is no exception. Barely got a 74 in this class. Avoid her at all costs.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: I took this class online. Myself and several people from GroupMe emailed the professor with no response. Other than that, your grade is what you get at the end of Connect Math and Final Exam, clear cut!

I took her online for Statistics during the summer. I am not good at mathematics, AT ALL, but I still got an A. She's super clear and organized about due dates and grading criteria. She cares so much about you passing; you have unlimited tries on homework, 2 tries per exam - and she didn't activate Lockdown Browser for our final!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Took Professor Doriney online. Unlimited attempts on homework and two attempts on final. 10/10 recommend. She truly cares about you passing!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took this class as a hybrid. Professor Doriney explains everything clearly and is open to going over anything you dont understand. Attendance is not necessary and all homework assignments and tests are taken online and at home on connect math (you have to purchase it to access). Final is cumulative, but she gives a helpful review.

She has been great! Lectures are very well explained. I took this class as a hybrid and homework/tests were taking at home. Material started to get hard but she makes it so clear thats its very easy to make an A. Definitely take her!

If you're good at math, definitely take her! If you struggle, be sure to attend class lectures and study a lot. She sometimes explains things differently, but if you ask, she is super helpful in explaining the concept over again. Easy A as long as you do the homework and are prepared before you take the tests. Loved Doriney!

She is funny and gives good lectures! My class was partially online so you are expected to do work on a lot of the material by yourself, but she's good at explaining concepts if you have a question. She can be bad about responding to emails. The class was only once a week and she scheduled a lot of non-meet days so it felt like I barely had class!

Doriney is the best math teacher I've ever had at KSU. Legit cares about you and makes sure you understand. All homework is online but its based on her classes, don't miss them she explains how to do everything in class. Super funny, relaxed and real, I would definitely take her again.

She was a great teacher, sincerely wanted everyone to understand. Homework is online, you just keep doing it until you make a 100. I didn't do so well, because I missed so many classes. Easy A if you come to class and listen, I'm disappointed with myself.

Professor Doriney is the best math teacher I have ever had my entire life. She was SO nice and truly cared about our class. She does struggle with checking her email, so if your someone who wants an immediate response to emails you won't get that. But I am terrible at math and she made it simple for me! :)

i took her pre-calc class in high-school, which was very similar, so i had basically already learned what was taught in this class. However, she is hilarious, and willing to help yo. Her class is pretty simple, and you know exactly what the tests will be like. She gives online HW on mymathlab, and all the exams are also online, you have 2 attempts

Professor Doriney was a great teacher! Her lectures were interesting and she is funny too.  If you go to class and take notes, you won't have a problem in the class. Show up to every class because she will sometimes give extra credit on days that not a lot of people show up and that helped get an A in the end. I highly recommend taking her.

TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER!!!! She was one of the best math professors I've ever had! She's funny and laid back. She makes the lectures super fun and easy to understand, and she's really all about interacting with her students to make sure they get what they're learning.

Her class is once a week and attendance is NOT mandatory. She has two classes back-to-back and you can go to either one if you want. Everything is online and the homework tells you how to do everything. Going to her lectures are awesome because she's hilarious and she makes learning it a lot easier if the homework isn't helping.

Prof. Doriney was a great professor. I had her for the hybrid class on Trig which only had class once a week. She was great at explaining the problems, immediately answers questions (even by email), and is pretty laid back. However, majority of the work is done on MyMathLab. It was for the most part good but can be difficult especially w the final

I had her trig class as a hybrid class. Her first test was kind of hard however the others were not so bad they were also online. She teaches quite well, math doesn't come easy for me but when she explains it for some reason it sticks to me. She uses MymathLab for the most part so no need to buy the book.

4 HW, 4 Quizzes, 4 tests, and 1 final (can skip if A average on the other tests). Best math prof I've had. Very funny and clear. Always checks to make sure if class is clear on subject. Go to class to take good notes. Attend SI sessions for understanding and extra credit. TAKE HER CLASS AT ALL COSTS. Don't slack on trig functions (last subject).
AMAZING. She makes learning interesting. She's always joking around and getting the class involved. Very sweet and approachable. SI sessions are also very helpful

Ms. Dorieny Is awesome!!! I am an Adult learner and having not taken any math courses other than algebra the semester before taking her for precalc it has been 12 years since taking any math course. I have never been someone who enjoyed math, she makes it fun and easy to understand. Two things I never thought I'd say about math!Take her she rocks!

Professor is nice enough. Has a former student who does SI sessions. I could never attend and maybe that would have made a difference. Class was very hard. She goes very fast and does not cover a lot of material that she tests on. Good news is no book needed and her powerpoints are excellent. Wouldn't take her again by choice though. Hard C to earn

Tough for people who have not taken Trig in the last 5 years.  Very rushed.  Enjoyed the teacher, but needed more time to digest the information.  A lot of information presented in a very short period of time.
Very helpful teacher and good interaction with class. Study and do homework and you will do fine on the tests. willing to explain if there are any questions.

Her class was easy but you have to do the homework online and practice practice practice. Go to the SI sessions. Very helpful. She's very layed back. Take notes in class and do the study guides she gives you. Ask questions, she is very helpful! Final was hard but if you do good on her other 4 tests, youll be fine.

If you have had pre calc recently and are familiar, looking for a refresher she might not be bad. If you need to be taught math run away. Goes too fast, partially teaches lessons and expects a lot of inferred knowledge based on the homework she gives without solutions and does not cover. Most frustrating class I have had in college.

I really enjoyed Taking her class she interacts well with students and makes sure you understand the material she doesnt assume you know everything and she teaches you Why 2+2=4 ( figuratively speaking) instead f telling yo to memorize it i came out with a C and math is not my forte but i would definitely take her class again.

I enjoyed her class for the most part. Her final was unlike any of her previous tests though. I went into the final with a 94 and ended up with an 87 in the class because of one grade. Compared to her past tests it was absolutely unfair. I felt like I studied apples when I was going in to take a final on oranges. Don't take if you want an A.

All the haters below left a negative feedback on the grade they've received from the 4th test. She is overall a nice teacher, as long as you do the work and attend the class sessions, which are about 20minutes, you'll do fine

If you're looking for a really chill teacher that is willing to elaborate and assist you on any assignments prior to the test, take her class. If you already understand Calc and need a flexible teacher and an easy A, taker her class.

HIGHLY recommend this class, you have four tests and a final and 4 online homework assignments with unlimited tries so they are free 100s, she tells you what is going to be on the test and will let you out after about 30 minutes in an hour and 15 min class. attendance isn't mandatory but go to class for practice and the SI sessions for extra credit

Very easy class. In class, she will literally tell you exact problems that will be on the test. She's sarcastic and funny and keeps you interested in the material. Attendance is not mandatory, and we are always let out after about 30 minutes of an hour and 15 minute class. But if you show up for class, you will make an A.

She is awesome! Her test are hard but if you study you should be fine. Made an A in her class because of it and because She is there for you and always willing to help. She is funny and keeps you engaged which helps. I had her last semester and miss her! TAKE HER! You will not regret it.

best math class i have ever had. the tests are not hard as long as you do the homework. she makes class fun and easy to understand. and she rewards those who actually try to learn. shes definitely one of the better teachers at ksu

Go to class if you want to pass. She makes everything easy to understand and is available before and after for any questions. No need for the textbook. The notes from class and what she posts online is sufficient.
Absolutely the Best
Monica Doriney is a gift from God. If you don't take her you are clearly insane.
She is so funny. tests are fair, if you practice the problem you should be fine. SHe is willing to help, make Math more enjoyable

This is the best math teacher I have ever had. Her class is very easy if you just show up and do your homework. She is extremely helpful and VERY funny. She keeps class interesting. You MUST take her for precalc
Aside from being a great math professor and teacher, she's just a really neat lady. Very nice, helpful, and she has a great sense of humor. If you're taking MATH 1113, take her class!

She was a great teacher. She knew her material. she is funny. If you do have a hard time with math just be patient with her. Ask for help she'll help you. Ask her to go slower if you need something repeated. she's very helpful.

Mrs. Doriney is a great teacher. I suck at math to begin with, but Mrs. Doriney really does what she can to see that all her students succeed. It's important you do the homework on Mathlab and she will give extra credit points every once in awhile. She does her best to explain the material as best as possible. I highly recommend her.

She was a very knowledgeable teacher. She is also a high school math teacher (if you think that will help in anyway). She posts all notes and handouts on Ga View, so that if you miss class you have what we did. Tests aren't difficult. She is a great teacher if you aren't particularly good in math. I would recommend taking her!

Prof. Doriney is AMAZING. She's so nice, hilarious, and she explains everything clearly. Do the homework on the math lab site, that's REALLY important. Before exams, she posts study guides on Vista and the answers. She's very willing to help out any student who needs it. I definitely recommend taking her.

Professor Doriney explained everything very clearly. She gave extra credit on almost if not all tests and if you do your homework you should do well in the class. She's easy going but would like you to show up in class.

This class was hard but the proffesor was very helpful. She gave several extra credit/point opportuinties.  Although there were a lot of tests she always told use what types of problems were on the test and she always provided a study guide with answers.She was extremely helpful;she often came in early or stayed late helping students.She was great!

knows her material, doesn't use the full amount of time for class. has a tendency to fly through material. does not explain clearly and I had to teach myself a lot of the information. Doesnt keep attendance, but DONT SKIP. Tons of information. a LOT of studying is required. little homework, provides test reviews and chances for extra credit.

Ms. Dorsey knew her material but she taught as if we  should know how to do the math. She wanted the students to be responsible for getting their assignments but she wouldn't be responsible in keeping her word on things like posting the assignments when needed. She also didn't have specific problems on the test when she promised she would.

She was too much in a hurry to let out class early everyday. She rushed through material and complained when people couldn't keep up. I basically had to teach myself the material. Would not recommend.
Although this class is not easy, Ms. Doriney provides many opportunities to reciev an A in the course.  I think she is a great teacher!
This Professor is great! She knows her material and she knows how to teach it! I loved this class and I would choose her as my professor again in the future!
She was great!
I loved this class! It was great! I would take her again!
